title: Operational Metrics Snapshot
description: A point-in-time snapshot of all Section-9 operational dashboard metrics for a project.

autopilotReadySpecsPct.description: Fraction of specs that are autopilot-ready (have complete contracts + checkpoint-compatible baseline).

completeContractSpecsPct.description: Fraction of specs with complete contracts (all required fields set, baseline profile assigned).

checkpointCompatibleSpecsPct.description: Fraction of specs with checkpoint-compatible baseline/profile mapping.

validatorFailCategoryDistribution.description: Map of validator fail category to count.

exceptionQueueVolume.description: Number of items in the exception queue.

exceptionQueueAgingHours.description: Median age (hours) of items in the exception queue.

loraActivationToApprovalHours.description: Median hours from LoRA activation to first approved output.

promptCompileDriftByCheckpoint.description: Map of checkpointId to drift fraction (changed compile hashes / total).

promptCompileDriftByTagFamily.description: Map of tag family to drift fraction (changed compile hashes / total).

automationTriggerToRunLatencyMs.description: Median latency (ms) from automation trigger event to run start.

idempotencyDedupeHitRate.description: Fraction of events that hit an idempotency dedup.

escalationReasonCodeDistribution.description: Map of escalation reason to count.

pinnedProfileDriftViolations.description: Count of runs where a pinned profile was overridden or violated.
